main event: Witness reported observing a large, disk-shaped object emitting a bright yellowish-white glow hovering over his backyard for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as being 30-40 feet in diameter and hovering 100 feet above the ground., The object accelerated rapidly and disappeared from view., The witness, Alberto, reported feeling shaken by the experience., The sighting occurred on 3 November 1958 at about 8:30 PM., Further investigation is recommended due to the lack of explanation for what was seen.
sighted object: large, disk-shaped craft emitting a bright yellowish-white glow
witness description: Alberto, who seemed shaken and unsure about what he witnessed
